Package com.csse3200.game.areas.terrain

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.terrain.GameMap
public class GameMap extends Object
the GameMap class is used to store and easily access and manage the components related to the game map

    • worldCoordinatesToPixelPosition

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 worldCoordinatesToPixelPosition(int x, int y)
      Conversion function: gets the centre of a tile from a coordinate position e.g. on a 4x4 tile grid, (0, 0) in the world translates to (8, 56) on the pixel grid
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Returns:
      a Vector2 value

    • pixelPositionToWorldCoordinates

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pixelPositionToWorldCoordinates(int xPixel, int yPixel)
      Conversion function: gets the centre of a tile from a coordinate position e.g. on a 4x4 tile grid, (6, 50) on the pixel grid translates to (0, 0) in the world
      Parameters:
      xPixel - x pixel screen coordinate
      yPixel - y pixel screen coordinate
      Returns:
      a Vector2 value

    • getTileTerrainCategory

      public TerrainTile.TerrainCategory getTileTerrainCategory(int x, int y)
      Returns the terrain category at a specified tile
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)
      Returns:
      the TerrainCategory of the specified tile

    • setTileTerrainCategory

      public void setTileTerrainCategory(TerrainTile.TerrainCategory terrainCategory, int x, int y)
      Sets the terrainCategory at the specified tile to the provided terrainCategory
      Parameters:
      terrainCategory - terrinCategory to set the TerrainTile to
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)

    • isTileTraversable

      public boolean isTileTraversable(int x, int y)
      Returns whether the specified terrain is traversable
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)
      Returns:
      true if the tile is traversable and false if not

    • isTileOccupied

      public boolean isTileOccupied(int x, int y)

      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)
      Returns:
      true if the tile is occupied and false if not

    • getTileCropTile

      public Entity getTileCropTile(int x, int y)
      Returns a specified terrainTile's cropTile
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)
      Returns:
      cropTile which occupies the terrainTile. Returns null if not occupied by cropTile

    • setTileCropTile

      public void setTileCropTile(Entity cropTile, int x, int y)
      Places a cropTile on a specified TerrainTile replacing any cropTile that already occupied it
      Parameters:
      cropTile - cropTile that will occupy the terrainTile
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)

    • removeTileCropTile

      public void removeTileCropTile(int x, int y)
      Removes the cropTile from the specified terrainTile
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.x -1)
      y - y coordinate (0 -> MAP_SIZE.y -1)
